comments: Professor is very nice and helpful when I had any issues. Knows what he doing and gets excited to teach his students.
I only did well in the course because I have taken chemistry before. He was confusing in his explanations. To top it all off, he was 50 minutes late to the final!!! Totally unprofessional.

This is the worst teacher I\'ve ever had, completely unorganized, doesn\'t take the time to explain ANYTHING & doesn\'t even take the time to grade things properly. Answers on quizzes will be different answers on exams. DO NOT TAKE HIM!!! He\'s HORRIBLE!!! When asked to clarify things, he just sends back nasty emails. Worst class I\'ve ever taken.

This professor is smart but not teacher material.He does not want to answer questions or help clarify information. He is often confused with what he is teaching and makes rules up as he goes and then when tested on it the answer he said is wrong!And the study guides would be useful if he gave you the right answers. Good luck studying wrong answers!

This professor is great. You have to pay attention and the class matter is extremely hard. He keeps the attention of the class and keeps us motivated to keep going. I take his class at TRI-C Eastern & would take another class with him. He will ding you on spelling, but just catch him with a spelling error and it\'s a wash. Give him a chance.

this guy is a real piece of work. he should be in a laboratory somewhere doing research and findings but definately not teaching. cannot spell but will hold you to the correct spelling, cannot make any sense of his course objectives or what he is trying to teach and then quizzes you adamantly on useless information. god forbid you ask for help.

This is the worst prof./teacher I have ever had. He does not instruct, can not answer questions, or solve problems correctly. He tests and quizes on subject matter never presented and does not follow his syllabus at all. He makes things up as he goes. He is incompetant and unprofessional. Do not take a class with him it is a waste of money and time
CAN\'T SPELL-CAN\'T SPEAK-CLASS IS TOTALLY LOST AT ALL TIMES
